thread.title: Watch: Shark vs seal in Gansbaai
thread.title_full: Watch: Shark vs seal in Gansbaai

author: Megan Ellis
title: Watch: Shark vs seal in Gansbaai
text:
Watch: Shark vs seal in Gansbaai   Fri, 10 Jul 2015 11:56 AM Share Your Email Credit: MarineDynamics Shark Tours/YouTube 
Guests on a marine safari in Gansbaai were treated to a rare sight when a great white shark attempted to catch a Cape fur seal. 
A video of the encounter was uploaded to YouTube by MarineDynamics Shark Tours and shows how close the attack was to clients on a Dyer Island Cruises marine tour. 
"The predation attempt was so close to our vessel Whale Whisperer that guests on board were splashed by all the activity," Dyer Island Cruises said on their blog . 
While the great white was quick, the seal was quicker - and in the end it escaped its predator. 
Watch the amazing encounter below: Related Articles
